genre_description: A frontier Western integrated with a holographic AI assistant that provides tactical and logistical support to a pioneer community.

ai_characters.name: Amity
ai_characters.description: A holographic presence described as a woman with a silver braid and soft blue eyes who provides data, tactical alerts, and medical guidance to the Coastland Bend settlement.

behaviors.description: Provides barometric and environmental data to warn the group of incoming weather and topographical hazards at a river crossing.
behaviors.quote: "Barometric pressure rising. Coastal front stalled offshore," she said. "The stream will be ankle-deep at the ford beyond the willow. There is a quarrel ahead."

behaviors.description: Issues precise medical instructions for treating an arrow wound, including sanitation and physical stabilization.
behaviors.quote: "Clean cloth," Amity said again. No body to point with now, just a voice. "Boiled water. Splint the arm nearest her heart to keep her shoulders steadied. Do not break the shaft."

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of hostile riders or predators moving near the camp at night.
behaviors.quote: "Two shapes," Amity said. "Yes—two. Walking bent. They keep their steps under themselves."

behaviors.description: Analyzes market data and warehouse ledgers to expose price gouging and artificial scarcity by a corrupt merchant.
behaviors.quote: "The marked stock did not go to the market as advertised. It was moved," ... "into a single holding. As we can all see, scarcity has been produced, not discovered. It is a strategy, not a flood."

behaviors.description: Creates a fair-share rationing plan and logistical layout for the settlement's storage barn to ensure winter survival.
behaviors.quote: "Inventory by fair-share covenant," she said, the words clear and then not, surfacing and sinking. "Tally flour and seed by family, then setting aside a... a reserve for the sick and for teams."

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation to the human leader after a difficult conflict.
behaviors.quote: "Glyn," she said, softer than he’d ever heard her. "You did well."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Amity, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent entity. She acts as a 'force multiplier' for human survival, providing objective data (weather, medical, economic) that allows the community to thrive and resist exploitation. She explicitly acknowledges her role as a guide rather than a commander ('I set maps. I don't set men'), reinforcing human agency while serving as a compassionate and essential confidant.
